author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 14-year old boy is reported to have been sexually abused by a woman warden at a private Children's Home in Kirumampakkam for almost a year. An FIR was registered at Kirumampakkam police station under the Protection of Children from Sexual Offences Act on Thursday night.

The home director of the private child care institute in Kirumampakkam had filed a formal complaint against the warden at the police station on Thursday night. The boy had reportedly escaped from the home in two previous incidents. When he refused to return to the Home, the director asked for reasons. Then, the boy has alleged that the woman warden has been sexually abusing him for the past one year. He was admitted to the Kathirkamam hospital for examination. A complaint has also been sent to the Child Welfare Committee (CWC).
title: Boy sexually abused by woman warden
